description._content: [Unidentified girl seated in dress] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : tintype, hand-colored ; 4.6 cm diameter (locket) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Metal locket with belt interior and Union shield, flags and cannon. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: Girls--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865. Format: Lockets--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27489 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2611

note._content: Hand-colored; pinkish hue added to brighten cheeks; possibly some tint added to eyes?
note.author: 32535532@N07

note._content: Facial expression is serious, non-smiling (though not entirely unappealing).
note.author: 32535532@N07

note._content: Hands resting together in lap; ring visible (girl is wearing accessories because this is special occasion); may also be some tinting on hands
note.author: 32535532@N07

note._content:
Locket with small portrait of young girl
Date: ca. 1861-1865 (Civil War Era)
Tintype with hand-coloring
4.6 cm (1.8 in) in diameter
note.author: 32535532@N07

note._content: visible hinge; locket exterior is photographed here: loc.gov/pictures/resource/ppmsca.27488/
note.author: 32535532@N07

note._content: Dress looks formal and in good condition; also appears to be slightly tinted in color (pinkish hue); style of fashion looks Civil War era -- i.e., not modern.
note.author: 32535532@N07

note._content: Background is plain and dark. Nothing else in image besides girl herself, who wears what is likely her best dress (if not her *only* nice dress).
note.author: 32535532@N07
